java/liquibase/preconditions/ChangeSetExecutedPrecondition.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00005 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00006 import liquibase.RanChangeSet;
00007 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00008 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionErrorException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00010 import liquibase.exception.DatabaseHistoryException;
00011 
00012 public class ChangeSetExecutedPrecondition implements Precondition {
00013 
00014     private String changeLogFile;
00015     private String id;
00016     private String author;
00017 
00018     public String getChangeLogFile() {
00019         return changeLogFile;
00020     }
00021 
00022     public void setChangeLogFile(String changeLogFile) {
00023         this.changeLogFile = changeLogFile;
00024     }
00025 
00026     public String getId() {
00027         return id;
00028     }
00029 
00030     public void setId(String id) {
00031         this.id = id;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public String getAuthor() {
00035         return author;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public void setAuthor(String author) {
00039         this.author = author;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException, PreconditionErrorException {
00043         ChangeSet changeSet = new ChangeSet(getId(), getAuthor(), false, false, getChangeLogFile(), getChangeLogFile(), null, null);
00044         RanChangeSet ranChangeSet;
00045         try {
00046             ranChangeSet = database.getRanChangeSet(changeSet);
00047         } catch (Exception e) {
00048             throw new PreconditionErrorException(e, changeLog, this);
00049         }
00050         if (ranChangeSet == null) {
00051             throw new PreconditionFailedException("Change Set '"+changeSet.toString(false)+"' has not been run", changeLog, this);
00052         }
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getTagName() {
00056         return "changeSetExecuted";
00057     }
00058 }
